text:
How to determine the measure of one exterior angle given the number of sides ex 3

\begin{array}{l}\n\text { 0 } \\\n\text { P. } I=\frac{(n-2) 180^{\circ}}{n} \\\n\text { . } \\\nS=(n-2) 180^{\circ}\n\end{array}[imath]\text { 0 } [/imath] [imath]\text { P. } I=\frac{(n-2) 180^{\circ}}{n} [/imath] [imath]\text { . } [/imath] [imath]S=(n-2) 180^{\circ}[/imath]
